TopicTitle: Twitch Thursdays: Das is a Pepper

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_ndx9yj0i0H1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv:80/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv:80/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=DP%2B6%2BPack%2Bto%2BOrbit.%2B6444%2BdV%2Bto%2Bburn%2521&channel=dasvaldez&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&chapter_id=5220856"></object><a href="http://bit.ly/X3pgb6"><strong>DASVALDEZ</strong></a> launches a Dr. Pepper six pack into orbit. We repeat, he launches a six pack of Dr. Pepper into orbit. Are you a fan of soft drinks and KSP? This clip’s for you.</p>

I was there, but i had stuff that needed doing, so i could not watch it.

(p.s: i went to jool with 2300 m/s DV)
